name: 30% ruling - minimum salary threshold
description: Highly skilled migrant at minimum salary threshold of €50,000

sources.description: Calculated with 30% ruling: only 70% (€35,000) is taxable
sources.notes: Taxable: €35,000, Tax: €12,939.50, General credit on €35,000: €2,686.73, Labour credit on full €50,000 salary: €4,878.10 (verified from arbeidskorting table), Total credits: €7,564.83, Net tax: €5,374.67, Net ≈ €44,625
